summary: This Mod allows you to craft Arrows and Lockpicks.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] Craftable Arrows and Lockpicks [/B] [/center]


[color=GREEN] [center][list]
 [*] 1. What does this Mod do ?
 [*] 2. Installation
 [*] 3. Changelog
 [*] 4. News from PlaZmA1337
[/list] [/center] [/color]


[center] [u] [b] What does this Mod do ? [/b] [/u] 

This Mod allows you to craft your own Arrows and Lockpicks.

[U] [b] 2. Installation [/u] [/b]

[list]

 [*]1. Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager.
 [*]2. Download the File and put it into Skyrim/Data folder.

[/list] 

To uninstall deactivate in NMM or Delete the File from Data folder.


[b] [u] [color=RED] Changelog [/u] [/b] [/color]


+ added nordhero arrow
+all bugs with hawkfeathers should be fixed
+numbers of arrows for one crafting was changed to 5
+changed required mats. for arrows and lockpicks

__________________V1.1 to V1.2________________________________

+added firewood for arrows
+added hawkfeathers for arrows
+ required materials for the arrows are lowered
+numbers of arrows for one crafting was changed (sometimes higher, sometimes lower)

__________________V1.0 to V1.1________________________________

Release

For Questions, Bugreports and suggestions send me an Message. 

Thanks


[/center]
author: PlaZmA1337
